publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3176 Robin Harper: Threat of Nuclear War over Kashmir—That the Parliament recognises with grave concern the dispute between India and Pakistan over Kashmir, the military build up of millions of troops along their borders and the potential for escalation to nuclear war including the immediate threat of annihilation of at least 12 million civilians of both countries; strongly urges the UK Prime Minister to visit the region and to use his personal relationship with the President of the United States of America to urge that the President also visits the region, and calls on Her Majesty’s Government to suspend immediately the sale of all arms and munitions to the region and to put a proposal before the United Nations for a peacekeeping force to be introduced along the zone of control as a matter of extreme urgency. R
